name: Namrata
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the happiness always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: I Know You thinking about Whats going on!! wait na...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: On your special day, well you've got everyday special so move on from this May the stars shine brightly to guide you towards your dreams  May the bundle of joy and laughter fill your heart,  May the moonshine of happiness crown your head, You are a shining light in this world,  With a heart as pure as the morning dew, And a spirit as free as the breeze.  May your day as beautiful and radiant as you are.
